com.ephesoft.dcma.webservice.service

Class EphesoftWebService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.webservice.service.EphesoftWebService

  • @Controller
public class EphesoftWebService
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class provides the functionality of the Web services feature used to preparation and restarting batch instances.
    Version:
    $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on Jul 25, 2013

      • prepareDataAndRestartBatch

        @RequestMapping(value="/batchIdentifier/{batchId}/server/{serverURL}/folderLocation/{folderPath}/batchClassId/{batchClassId}/moduleName/{moduleName}/newBatchInstanceIdentifier/{newBatchInstanceIdentifier}/batchName/{batchName}",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public java.lang.String prepareDataAndRestartBatch(@PathVariable(value="batchId")
                                                                      java.lang.String batchId,
                                                                      @PathVariable(value="serverURL")
                                                                      java.lang.String serverURL,
                                                                      @PathVariable(value="folderPath")
                                                                      java.lang.String folderPath,
                                                                      @PathVariable(value="batchClassId")
                                                                      java.lang.String batchClassId,
                                                                      @PathVariable(value="moduleName")
                                                                      java.lang.String moduleName,
                                                                      @PathVariable(value="newBatchInstanceIdentifier")
                                                                      java.lang.String newBatchInstanceIdentifier,
                                                                      @PathVariable(value="batchName")
                                                                      java.lang.String batchName)
        Prepare data and restart batch.
        Parameters:
        batchId - the batch id
        serverURL - the server url
        folderPath - the folder path
        batchClassId - the batch class id
        moduleName - the module name
        newBatchInstanceIdentifier - the new batch instance identifier
        batchName - the batch name
        Returns:
        the string

      • restartBatchInstance

        @RequestMapping(value="/batchInstanceIdentifier/{batchInstanceIdentifier}/moduleName/{moduleName}/throwException/{throwException}",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public boolean restartBatchInstance(@PathVariable(value="batchInstanceIdentifier")
                                                       java.lang.String batchInstanceIdentifier,
                                                       @PathVariable(value="moduleName")
                                                       java.lang.String moduleName,
                                                       @PathVariable(value="throwException")
                                                       boolean throwException)
                             throws DCMAApplicationException
        Restart batch instance.
        Parameters:
        batchInstanceIdentifier - the batch instance identifier
        moduleName - the module name
        throwException - the throw exception
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException - the dCMA application exception
